EasyDict
========

.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   /api/fleras/EasyDict.__setattr__
   /api/fleras/EasyDict.__setitem__
   /api/fleras/EasyDict.update
   /api/fleras/EasyDict.pop

.. py:class:: fleras.EasyDict(d=None, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`dict`


   dict() -> new empty dictionary
   dict(mapping) -> new dictionary initialized from a mapping object's
       (key, value) pairs
   dict(iterable) -> new dictionary initialized as if via:
       d = {}
       for k, v in iterable:
           d[k] = v
   dict(**kwargs) -> new dictionary initialized with the name=value pairs
       in the keyword argument list.  For example:  dict(one=1, two=2)

Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   fleras.EasyDict.__setitem__


Methods
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   fleras.EasyDict.__setattr__
   fleras.EasyDict.update
   fleras.EasyDict.pop
